column1: Baby Barnaby's////We ended up parking a block away
column3: but then there was a mass of people everywhere.  If you've never been here before
column4: make sure you're going to the 2 doors at the patio
column5: where there is a pad.  Put your name
column7: and whether you have a seating preference.  The line moves pretty quickly
column8: and they do have an outdoor beverage area for waiting customers.   If you don't know to put your name on that list
column10: you will wait even longer until you realize what you have to do.
